name: LedgeFall
description:
LedgeFall is a twitchy arcade action-platformer where your goal is to go deeper.

Exactly  how  deep? 

Deeper than you went last time.

Crazy powerups, torso-sized gems, hordes of enemies and more, await.

Go deeper into the well and beat your own best scores. Charon will block your path if you carry gems with you, but if you carry more than 5, you can exchange them for powerups, such as-

Double Jump (Allows you one extra jump in air or after stomping enemies)

Low Gravity (Lowers the effect of gravity, allowing you higher jumps and more air control)

Extra Speed (Increases the speed of your actions such as movement and jumping)

Charon's Obol (Ensures that Charon won't show up on your next run, allowing you to carry gems over to the run after, giving you a higher chance of exchanging for a powerup)

Controls

WASD/Arrow Keys 

WASD/ Arrow KeysMoveJ/ X/ Space BarJump

Art and Animation by MissingFox

Sounds and Music by Batata

Programming and Design by CheezGarlick
